name: Back to Hooman
description:
A lonely scanner boy got lost in the warehouse shelves. Stand by his side as he attempts the knotty way back into the hands of his human.

Credits: 
Angelo Paonessa
János Weyhknecht
Thomas-Chase Scheffel
Marco Serrao
Philipp Stenger
Marvin Spahn 

1 plywood texture and 1 wood texture from texturelib.com - great textures
